narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Elizabeth Tucker is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Reidsville, NC. From 2018-01 through 2020-09, this provider received $241K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 534 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2020-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
